snippet: KIRSHENBAUM--Wendy, 60. Our beautiful, courageous and gracious Wendy has left us much too soon after a valiant battle. Daughter of the late A. Hyman Kirshenbaum M.D., Judy Kirshenbaum Milstein and stepfather Monroe Milstein. Loving mother to Adam and Jordan (Joanna) Lipstadt and the most amazing grandmother to Isabel and Alexander Lipstadt. Sister to Barry (Corrine) Kirshenbaum. Loving dear friend of Joe Swedroe. Shiva at Kirshenbaum and Milstein home. 1/3
